recipesJson.name: Bubbaz Churronimo  CLONE
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Bubbaz attempt at a enhanced clone of Churronimo by F Jerrys. Let steep at least a week, although you impatient ones will still enjoy this off the shake. 

In progress. Comments welcome.
